name: Meteor Armageddon
description:
Fend off the incomming barrage of meteors for as long as you can while you wait for your certain demise on this ill-fated planet. Manage your mana usage, perfect your aim and rack up a huge score as you wait for the inevitable end.

Features

Shoot down the unending barrage of meteors to survive as long as possible and get a high score.

The amount of shots you can take is limited, so conserve your mana and only take the shots you need to to survive.

There are occasionaly special meteors that provide unique bonuses when destroyed. Use these to help you survive for longer.

After every game, the points you earn can be spent in the Upgrades Store to give you an edge in the comming rounds.
